summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5532 for the improvement of West Viewmont Way, from a point 125 feet, more or less, south of the south line of West Dravus Street to Emerson Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by constructing sewer together with the necessary appurtenances and treatment plant, under Ordinance No. 70967, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
